Key Arguments: The bill deprives Australians of free speech.
The legislation aligns with Marxist/Communist/Socialist ideologies.
Politicians are serving international agendas rather than the interests of Australians.
The bill represents a move towards totalitarian tyranny.
Notable Quotes: This Bill deprives every Australian citizen of having free speech and that is exactly the core of Marxist/Communism/Socialism.
Diggers in two World Wars sacrificed their lives to protect us from this totalitarian tyranny.
